text: Lilia Aragón (born Lilia Isabel Aragón del Rivero, 22 September 1938 – 2 August 2021) was a Mexican actress and politician. She was born in Cuautla, Morelos. Aragón was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 2004 until 2006. She was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party. Aragón was known for her roles in De frente al sol, Más allá del puente and Velo de novia.
